thread.title: Dot
thread.title_full: Feel Good Contact Lenses reviewed by Dot

author: Dot
title: Dot
text:
First time I've used this firm and I must say the service was top notch,unlike my previous supplier . Lenses arrived the next day as promised unlike my previous supplier and in pristine condition as you would expect and with a long shelf life.
Very pleased overall and have recommended to friends and will definitely use again .
Thankyou for the good service I received and continue the same standard.
